reviewText:
Charles is a hands on guy!  Kinda tells you like it is.  This is a step by step processs on two DVD's.  The great thing about it is he's not trying to impress you with how good he is.  He makes me believe I can do it myself. No it ain't easy. This is two disks, and a how to guide.

If you are a practical hands on guy who says damned that's expensive, you actually can talk to this guy by email.

How much did you spend for the material to make the bed?  And if you live in a rural area it may be just what your looking for.
